reviews.customers_say: Customers love this Christmas sweater for holiday gatherings, praising its stunning bright red color, soft velvet fabric, and comfortable, non-itchy feel.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flattering, soft, and perfect for holiday events!
items.body: I bought this top for an upcoming Santacon, and it’s even cuter in person. The velvet is soft and comfortable — definitely not that cheap “costume” material some holiday tops have. The fur trim is also surprisingly nice: soft, not itchy, and adds just the right festive touch. The fit is true to size. I can usually wear either a medium or large, and I went with the large for a slightly more relaxed fit. It wasn’t tight at all, and I could have gone with a medium if I wanted something more form-fitting. For reference, I’m 5’2” and 150 lbs, and the large still looked flattering without clinging. It’s comfy enough to wear all day, easy to move in, and looks great with black jeans or leggings. Perfect for holiday parties, Santacon, or any festive event where you want something cute but not over-the-top. Pros: • Soft, non-costume velvet • Comfortable and flattering fit • True to size • Nice, non-itchy fur trim • Great for holiday photos and events Cons: • None so far — super happy with it Read more
items.author: Tracey

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So Festive & Comfy
items.body: Love this top! The velvet quality is great - not cheap looking at all. True to size with a perfect fit, and just enough stretchness for comfort. Small note: the fur trim arrived a bit flat, but after fluffing it by hand it looks full and gorgeous! Definitely doesn't look cheap. Perfect for holiday vibes. Value for money! Read more
items.author: Rina

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tie to size, looks very nice.
items.body: The fit is excellent. The material is soft and not scratchy. Falls off the shoulder in a very sexy way. True to size fit. I’m smaller in the bust and it compliments nobody features Good value for the money. Read more
items.author: Trish

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Christmas shirt
items.body: It’s very nice the fabrice very soft I like it Read more
items.author: Lidia

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute fit
items.body: Really cute! I had to order my daughter one. I'm a rather big girl and tall. Ordered size xxl. Glad I did! My daughter is a slim size small. Can't wait to wear them together on our vacation Read more
items.author: gloria herbert

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Gave my daughter a rash!
items.body: Looked kind of cute on, I guess… pretty cheaply made, not very stretchy, the fur shed, and my daughter got a horrible rash where the fur came in contact with her skin. We had to buy it for a holiday performance and parade her cheer team was doing. Honestly decided to throw it away afterwards. I didn’t even feel good giving it away after seeing what it did to my poor kid. Might have been because she was so active and it reacted with sweat, but that doesn’t really make it any better. Read more
items.author: Eryn MR

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Runs a size smaller
items.body: Runs a size smaller Read more
items.author: Roxanna Anguiano

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cutest Christmas top ever❣️
items.body: This is the cutest top! I ordered a large and it’s true to size. Read more
items.author: Patricia D.

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
